content: Language **Orang Seletar** (Slitar) is a language of the [Orang Laut](/wiki/Orang_Laut) of the south coast of the [Malay Peninsula](/wiki/Malay_Peninsula). It is very close to [Malay](/wiki/Malay_language), and may be counted as a dialect of that language. The speaking population is unknown, but is likely in the range of a few thousand. The language is considered critically endangered by UNESCO. ## Sources This article about [Malayic languages](/wiki/Malayic_languages) is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
title: Orang Seletar language
